root.name: AFL Premiership 2007
root.description: Playable TeamsThere are 16 teams in AFL Premiership 2007 all of which are based on their real life counterpartsAdelaide CrowsColours: Red, Gold Navy BlueCarlton BluesColours: Navy BlueEssendon BombersColours: Red BlackGeelong CatsColours: Navy Blue WhiteKangaroosColours: Blue WhitePort Adelaide PowerColours: Silver, Teal, Black WhiteSt. Kilda SaintsColours: Red, White Black West Coast EaglesColours: Navy Blue, White GoldBrisbane LionsColours: Maroon, Blue GoldCollingwood MagpiesColours: Black WhiteFremantle DockersColours:Purple, Red GreenHawthorn HawksColours: Gold BrownMelbourne DemonsColours: Red Navy BlueRichmond TigersColours: Yellow BlackSydney SwansColours: Red WhiteWestern BulldogsColours: Red, White Blue
